radiographic_examinations.findings: Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. There is no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Liver demonstrates homogenous attenuation, no evidence of focal lesions or biliary dilatation. Pancreas and spleen normal. Kidneys normal with no focal lesions or hydronephrosis. Evidence of sigmoid diverticulitis with an adjacent abscess measuring 1.5 cm x 1.1 cm and extensive adjacent phlegmonous changes. Remainder of the colon shows mild diverticulosis.
